caption:
👟 GIVEAWAY 👟Random Acts of Giving, Giveaway #1: HOKA Gift Cards for fresh new sneakers!

To all the nurses who walk an average of 4 miles every single shift, we see you. And we want you to feel your best with a fresh, comfy pair of kicks! We’re thrilled to gift THREE clinicians a pair of Hoka sneakers. Each winner will receive a $150 gift card to choose a pair that will keep you moving and supported. 🎁🏃‍♀️ 

How to enter: 

1️⃣ Follow @connectRNapp. 
2️⃣ Like this post.
3️⃣ Comment and tag a nurse friend who deserves some fresh, new kicks, or share how long you’ve had your sneakers for! 

Winners will be announced on Monday, December 11th in our stories.

Winners must be located in the United States and must be 18 years or older at the time of entry. This contest is not affiliated with Instagram or Facebook. By participating or entering, you agree to release Instagram of all liability.

#RandomActsofGiving #Gratitude #ClinicianAppreciation #RNs #LPNs #NursingStudent #ListenToNurses #NurseGiveaway #CNAs #NurseLife
